alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN BEAVER AND SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East Palestine, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Beaver, New Beaver, Wampum, New Galilee, Enon Valley, Darlington, and S.n.p.j.. This includes the following highways... Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 2 and 8. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 19 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
